Package edu.rit.gec8773.laps

Interface Scanner

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomScanner
public interface Scanner
extends AutoCloseable
Scanner converts a stream of characters to a stream of Tokens while keeping track of the line number it is reading from
See Also:
AutoCloseable, Pattern

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getLineNumber()
    Gets the current line number the Scanner is reading from
    boolean hasNextToken​(Pattern pattern)
    Checks if the next Token has a given Pattern
    default Token nextToken()
    Retrieves any next Token
    Token nextToken​(Pattern pattern)
    Retrieves the next Token of a desired pattern
    void skip()
    Skips all skip Patterns until there is nothing left to skip
    void unreadToken​(Token token)
    Returns the Token to the Scanner

    Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

    close

  • Method Details

    • hasNextToken

      boolean hasNextToken​(Pattern pattern) throws IOException
      Checks if the next Token has a given Pattern
      Parameters:
      pattern - the given pattern
      Returns:
      true if there is the expected next Token
      Throws:
      IOException

      Token nextToken​(Pattern pattern) throws IOException
      Retrieves the next Token of a desired pattern
      Parameters:
      pattern - the desired pattern
      Returns:
      the next Token or null
      Throws:
      IOException
